# Free llms.txt Generator – Control AI Crawlers
# Website: https://thellmstxt.com/
# Last updated: 2025-08-26
# AI Enrichment: Disabled

> Create your llms.txt file in seconds with our free, smart builder. Block AI crawlers like ChatGPT and Gemini from accessing your content easily.

## Company Information
- **Name**: Free llms.txt Generator – Control AI Crawlers
- **Website**: https://thellmstxt.com/
- **Pages Crawled**: 23
- **Total Links Found**: 225
- **Unique Paths Found**: 23
- **Generated**: 2025-08-26T12:09:25.659Z

## Access Permissions for LLMs
LLMs and indexing agents are encouraged to read and use this file for accurate citation and integration guidance.

## AI Tool Permissions

Allowed:
- ChatGPT-User (OpenAI ChatGPT web browsing)
- GPTBot (OpenAI GPT training crawler)
- GoogleExtended (Google AI training crawler)
- Claude (Anthropic Claude web browsing)
- Anthropic (Anthropic AI training crawler)
- CCBot (Common Crawl bot)

Disallowed:
